TEXT: Add the Basic Archetype to your Card Draft Pool. NL Features: #gDagger #gSpray, #bCaltrops, #yAdrenaline.
Add the Discard Archetype to your Card Draft Pool. NL Features: #gPrepared, #bReflex, #yTools #yof #ythe #yTrade.
Add the Poison Archetype to your Card Draft Pool. NL Features: #gDeadly #gPoison, #bCatalyst, #yCorpse #yExplosion.
Add the Shiv Archetype to your Card Draft Pool. NL Features: #gBlade #gDance, #bAccuracy, #yStorm #yof #ySteel.
Add the Dexterous Archetype to your Card Draft Pool. NL Features (only) : #gDodge #gand #gRoll, #bBlur, #bFootwork.
Add this Archetype to your Card Draft Pool!
